attributes.action: Make the government uphold the decision of the people to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
All my adult life I have voted for all the elections and sometimes I have been happy with the outcome and sometimes not, but never before has the result been questioned and has always been respected.
We are fast becoming a laughing stock to our EU neighbours and its about time we showed unity as a nation. Should we let the EU dictate to the British people just because if we leave others may follow.
 The majority of the country voted to leave, not for this made up word called BREXIT. BREXIT was not on the ballot paper.
attributes.background:
Last chance to leave the EU, time to stand up for democracy 
Please sign if you agree with the following
1) should MP's be allowed to undermine democracy ?
2) Do you believe that the government and the elite has sabotaged the right to leave and the will of the People has been ignored?
